title: Warning Signs of Arthritis That Should Not be Neglected: Expert Advice
text:
2023-12-28 17:57:38
This Wednesday, December 27, 2023, several doctors are warning the population about these warning signs of arthritis that should not be neglected, in the columns of Huffpost.
While osteoarthritis is the most common form of arthritis, there are several forms such as gout, rheumatoid arthritis and lupus. So many joint inflammations which are sometimes the subject of warning signs which should not be neglected. “In general, people experience greater pain when walking on slopes, uneven surfaces, and climbing stairs. Even clothing, such as socks and shoes, can be painful”explains Dr. Mengnai Li, board-certified orthopedic surgeon and associate professor at Yale University School of Medicine.
Feeling joint pain as soon as you wake up is one of the elements likely to be associated with a form of arthritis or osteoarthritis. “An early sign of arthritis is pain when waking up and getting up in the morning after sleeping for hours,” details the surgeon in the columns of
Huffpost. Morning pain in the joints is not the only sign of osteoarthritis that should not be taken lightly, at the risk of seeing this inflammation worsen over time.
The rest after this ad
Several types of arthritis pain
Still according to the comments collected by our colleagues, the fact of see your joints swell can also be an early sign of arthritis. This symptom may be the consequence of an accumulation of synovial fluid, the primary function of which is to lubricate and soften the joints. “When osteoarthritis occurs, there is an increase in the volume of synovial fluid production and associated inflammation, which causes pain and swelling.”,illustre Mengnai Li.

Another warning sign of potential arthritis, feel stiffness in your jointsa symptom that should be monitored all the more if it presents itself upon waking up. “Many of my patients with knee osteoarthritis experience stiffness after getting up from a rest period or after sitting in a chair for a period of time”explains Pamela Mehta, orthopedic surgeon at Resilience Orthopedics.

Specialists draw attention to the fact that some warning signs of arthritis can take a more discreet form since they are not associated with any pain. According to Mengnai Li, the fact of Experiencing cracking or grinding noises in your joints may be an early sign of arthritis. These are all elements that should not be taken lightly at the risk of becoming subject, over time, to more painful inflammations in the joints. If there are warning signs of arthritis, you should therefore inform your doctor.
